title: Station-Verification report
description: JSON Report of the metric results generated by our Station-Validation tool for a specific network and station

network_code.description: The networks's unique code. Ex. QW

station_code.description: The station's unique code. Ex. QCQ

start_date.description: The first date of the verification period. Must be in YYYY-MM-DD format

end_date.description: The end of the verification period. Data will be tested for each day from the start date up to but not including the end date. Must be in YYYY-MM-DD format.

max_gap.description: The length in seconds of the largest gap in data across the entire testing period

passed.description: True if the max gap detected during the verification period is below the predefined threshold, otherwise its false

details.description: If passed is false, the size of the largest gap and the date that it appeared will be detailed here, otherwise its an empty string

items.description: The size of the gap, in unit of seconds

spikes.description: The number of times that the spikes flag is set in the data

details.description: If passed is false, the date and number of times the spike flag was set will be detailed here, otherwise its an empty string

items.description: integer that represents if the spikes flag was set, 1 = set, 0 = unset

pct_above_nhnm.description: The psd plot has high level and low level, this metric represents how much of the percentage is above the high level, for the given data

passed.description: If the percentage above the high level is greater than the threshold, this will be false, otherwise its true

details.description: If passed is false, the average percentage of noise above the new high noise modal will be detailed here, otherwise its an empty string

pct_below_nlnm.description: The psd plot has high level and low level, this metric represents how much of the percentage is below the low level. This metric should never be below zero otherwise it has failed

passed.description: If the percentage below the low level is greater than the threshold, this will be false, otherwise its true

details.description: If passed is false, the average percentage of below the new low noise modal will be detailed here, otherwise its an empty string

percent_availability.description: Percentage of data that is available for the time series. It should be 100% but incase of packet loss or network disruption, it wont be 100%

passed.description: The percentage should be above the treshold, otherwise it is false

details.description: If passed is false, the average percentage of data availablity will be detailed here, otherwise its an empty string

calibration_signal.description: Checks if the calibration_signal flag was set for any day, which would indicate that a calibration was performed on the insturmentation during the test period. Either the signal is on or off

passed.description: If the calibration signal flag was set, passed will be false, otherwise it is true

details.description: If the calibration signal flag was set, the day the flag was set on will be detailed here, otherwise it is empty

items.description: The Integer is either 1 for ON, or 0 for OFF

max_overlap.description: Checks the length in seconds of the largest overlap in the data during the transmission period

passed.description: if the value is bigger than the threshold, it will be false, otherwise its true

details.description: If passed is false, the max overlap in seconds, and the day the overlap was detected, will be detailed here, otherwise it is empty

num_gaps.description: How many gaps were found in the data, in the specified time period.

passed.description: If the number of gaps is bigger than the threshold, this will be false, otherwise it is true

details.description: If passed is false, the the number of gaps, and the day the gaps were bigger than the threshold will be detailed here, otherwise it is empty

num_overlaps.description: How many overlaps were found in the specified time period.

passed.description: If the number of overlaps is bigger than the threshold, this will be false, otherwise it is true

details.description: If passed is false, the the number of overlaps, and the day the overlaps were bigger than the threshold will be detailed here, otherwise it is empty

average_latency.description: Average latency value for the current channel over the validation period. Seconds, float

timely_availability.description: Percentage of latency values that fall below our threshold. Percentgage, float

total_latencies.description: Number of latency values that have been fetched from the Latency files for the current channel, in the validation period. Integer

failed_latencies.description: Number of latency values that have been fetched from the Latency files for the current channel that were above the threshold, in the validation period. Integer

max_gap.description: The length in seconds of the largest gap in data across the entire testing period

passed.description: True if the max gap detected during the verification period is below the predefined threshold, otherwise its false

details.description: If passed is false, the size of the largest gap and the date that it appeared will be detailed here, otherwise its an empty string

items.description: The size of the gap, in unit of seconds

timely_availability.description: Percentage of latency values that fall below our threshold. Percentgage, float

total_latencies.description: Number of latency values that have been fetched from the Latency files for the current channel, in the validation period. Integer

failed_latencies.description: Number of latency values that have been fetched from the Latency files for the current channel that were above the threshold, in the validation period. Integer

station_latency.description: The time in seconds between the acquisition of the sample in the field, until the time it received at the data centre

average_latency.description: Float; When the data is transmitted, there is a delay since it was created. That is refered to as latency. This property is the average of the latencies for the verifiction period

timely_availability.description: Float; How many packages we received in the timing threshold out of the total number of packages

timely_passed.description: Integer; If timely availability passes the treshold, then timely passed will be 1, otherwise it is 0

timing_quality.description: Daily average of the SEED timing quality stored in miniSEED blockette 1001. This value is vendor specific and expressed as a percentage of maximum accuracy. Percentage is NULL if not present in the miniSEED.

passed.description: if the timing quality is below the threshold, then this is false, otherwise it is true

clock_locked.description: How many times the internal clock of the digitizer was unlocked from the satellites

passed.description: If the clock locked is smaller than the threshold, then this is false, otherwise it is true

satellites_locked.description: The number of satellites that were locked during the time period

passed.description: If the number of satellites locked is smaller than the threshold, this is false, otherwise it is true
